### Load Packages, scripts, and functions
```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plyr)
library(dplyr)
library(grid)
library(MESS)
library(pgirmess)
library(Bolstad2)
library(phyloseq)
library(psych)
library(car)
source('scripts/misc.R')
set.seed(1)
theme_set(theme_bw())
```

### Load Data
```{r}
load('crds.norm.RData')
load('crds.use.Rdata')
meta <- read.csv('metadata.csv')
```

### Prepare CRDS data
```{r}
# Add metadata
crds.use[, colnames(meta)[3:ncol(meta)]] <- NA
for(i in 1:nrow(crds.use)){
  meta.row <- which(meta$ID == crds.use$ID[i])
  crds.use[i, 7:ncol(crds.use)] <- meta[meta.row, 3:ncol(meta)]
}

# Calculate square root of AUC
crds.use$AUC <- as.numeric(crds.use$AUC)
minAUC <- min(crds.use$AUC)
crds.use$AUC_sqrt <- crds.use$AUC + (minAUC * -1)
crds.use$AUC_sqrt <- sqrt(crds.use$AUC_sqrt)

# Convert to numeric
crds.use$AvgDelta <- as.numeric(crds.use$AvgDelta)
crds.use$MaxD <- as.numeric(crds.use$MaxD)
crds.use$MaxSlope <- as.numeric(crds.use$MaxSlope)
crds.use$AUC <- as.numeric(crds.use$AUC)
crds.use$AUC_sqrt <- as.numeric(crds.use$AUC_sqrt)
crds.use$Baseline <- as.numeric(crds.use$Baseline)


# Order categorical variables
crds.use$Season <- ordered(crds.use$Season, levels = c("Summer", "Winter", "Spring"))
crds.use$Sex <- ordered(crds.use$Sex, levels = c("Female", "Male"))
crds.use$Antibiotics <- ordered(crds.use$Antibiotics, levels = c("No", "Yes"))
crds.use$Substrate <- ordered(crds.use$Substrate, levels = c("Inulin", "Saline"))
crds.use$Diet <- ordered(crds.use$Diet, levels = c("1", "2"))

# Remove outliers
crds.rem <- crds.use[-which(crds.use$ID == "S23"),]
crds.rem <- crds.rem[-which(crds.rem$ID == "S37"),]
crds.rem <- crds.rem[-which(crds.rem$ID == "S60"),]
crds.rem <- crds.rem[-which(crds.rem$ID == "W43"),]
crds.rem <- crds.rem[-which(crds.rem$ID == "W20"),]
  # This is due to odd metagenome
crds.rem <- crds.rem[-which(crds.rem$ID == "W50"),]


# Separate by substrate
crds.inu <- crds.rem[which(crds.rem$Substrate == "Inulin"),]
crds.sal <- crds.rem[which(crds.rem$Substrate == "Saline"),]

# Separate by substrate + ABX
crds.inu.abx <- crds.inu[which(crds.inu$Antibiotics == "Yes"),]
crds.inu.noabx <- crds.inu[which(crds.inu$Antibiotics == "No"),]
crds.sal.abx <- crds.sal[which(crds.sal$Antibiotics == "Yes"),]
crds.sal.noabx <- crds.sal[which(crds.sal$Antibiotics == "No"),]

# Separate by substrate + season
crds.inu.s <- crds.inu[which(crds.inu$Season == "Summer"),]
crds.inu.w <- crds.inu[which(crds.inu$Season == "Winter"),]
crds.inu.p <- crds.inu[which(crds.inu$Season == "Spring"),]
crds.sal.s <- crds.sal[which(crds.sal$Season == "Summer"),]
crds.sal.w <- crds.sal[which(crds.sal$Season == "Winter"),]
crds.sal.p <- crds.sal[which(crds.sal$Season == "Spring"),]

```



### Test Baseline
```{r}
### All ###
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Season, crds.rem))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # p-value = 0.5284
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Season*Antibiotics + Antibiotics*Substrate + Antibiotics*Sex, crds.rem))
  # Season p < 2e-16
  # Antibiotics p = 3.24e-05
  # Substrate = 0.088999
  # Sex = 0.471015
  # Season:Antibiotics = 0.000424
  # Antibiotics:Substrate = 0.068254
  # Antibiotics:Sex = 0.008661
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Season*Antibiotics + Antibiotics*Substrate + Antibiotics*Sex, crds.rem), conf.level = 0.95)
  # Season
    # Summer-Winter adj p = 0, CI = 3.62083 - 5.360883
    # Summer-Spring adj p = 0, CI = 1.623308 - 3.323205
    # Winter-Spring adj p = 7e-07, CI = -2.862728 - -1.180926
  # Antibiotics
    # Yes-No adj p = 3.25e-05, CI = -1.874653 - -0.7155052
  # Substrate
    # Saline-Inulin adj p = 0.089385, CI = -0.791147 - 1.080033
  # Sex
    # Male-Female adj p = 0.4879419, CI = -0.3777569 - 0.7834081
  # Season:Antibiotics
    # Winter:No - Summer:No adj p = 0, CI = -6.5241983 - -3.6148534
    # Spring:No - Summer:No adj p = 0.0143505, CI = -3.0790374 - -0.2221174
    # Summer:Yes - Summer:No adj p = 0.2709376, CI = -2.6369151 - 0.4017966
    # Winter:Yes - Summer:No adj p = 0, CI = -6.4245534 - -3.4552156
    # Spring:Yes - Summer:No adj p = 0, CI = -5.8777208 - -2.9683759
    # Spring:No - Winter:No adj p = 0, CI = 1.9904884 - 4.8474084
    # Summer:Yes - Winter:No adj p = 0, CI = 2.4326107 - 5.4713224
    # Winter:Yes - Winter:No adj p = 0.9998426, CI = -1.3550275 - 1.6143102
    # Spring:Yes - Winter:No adj p = 0.7815858, CI = -0.8081950 - 2.1011500
    # Summer:Yes - Spring:No adj p = 0.9000736, CI = -0.9612603 - 2.0272966
    # Winter:Yes - Spring No adj p = 0.0000001, CI = -4.7483025 - -1.8303116
    # Spring:Yes - Spring:No adj p = 0.0000045, CI = -4.2009309 - -1.3440109
    # Winter:Yes - Summer:Yes adj p = 0, CI = -5.3704247 - -2.2742258
    # Spring:Yes - Summer:Yes adj p = 0.0000003, CI = -4.8248449 - -1.7861332
    # Spring:Yes - Winter:Yes adj p = 0.9090109, CI = -0.9678322 - 2.0015050
  # Antibiotics:Substrate
    # Yes:Inulin - No:Inulin adj p = 0.0001656, CI = -2.85310465 - -0.7441286
    # No:Saline - No:Inulin adj p = 0.9999991, CI = -1.05986342 - 1.0491127
    # Yes:Saline - No:Inulin adj p = 0.2875164, CI = -1.82427361 - 0.3488568
    # No:Saline - Yes:Inulin adj p = 0.0002543, CI = 0.71271253 - 2.8737699
    # Yes:Saline - Yes:Inulin adj p = 0.0668022, CI = -0.05094664 - 2.1727631
    # Yes:Saline - No:Saline adj p = 0.3135804, CI = -1.84418787 - 0.3795219
  # Antibiotics:Sex
    # Yes:Female - No:Female adj p = 0.4656405, CI = -1.6218659 - 0.46421856
    # No:Male - No:Female adj p = 0.1126607, CI = -0.1414469 - 1.96752922
    # Yes:Male - No:Female adj p = 0.0460236, CI = -2.3610610 - -0.01497325
    # No:Male - Yes:Female adj p = 0.0014082, CI = 0.4758236 - 2.50790613
    # Yes:Male - Yes:Female adj p = 0.4975900, CI = -1.7478009 - 0.52941394
    # Yes:Male - No:Male adj p = 0.0000513, CI = -3.2501600 - -0.95195662


### By Season ###
crds.s <- crds.rem[which(crds.rem$Season == "Summer"),]
crds.w <- crds.rem[which(crds.rem$Season == "Winter"),]
crds.p <- crds.rem[which(crds.rem$Season == "Spring"),]

# Summer
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Antibiotics, crds.s))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Antibiotics + Substrate + Sex, crds.s))
  # Antibiotics p = 0.0394
  # Substrate p = 0.1352
  # Sex = 0.8551
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Antibiotics + Substrate + Sex, crds.s))
  # Antibiotics
    # Yes - No adj p = 0.0394476, CI = -2.11751 - -0.05801414
  # Substrate
    # Saline - Inulin adj p = 0.1365095, CI = -0.2630195 - 1.789313 
  # Sex
    # Male - Female adj p = 0.8586166, CI = -0.9681393 - 1.151501

# Winter
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Antibiotics, crds.w))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Antibiotics + Substrate + Sex, crds.w))
  # No Sig


# Spring
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Antibiotics, crds.p))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Antibiotics + Antibiotics*Substrate + Antibiotics*Sex, crds.p))
  # Antibiotics p = 0.000164
  # Substrate p = 0.633626
  # Sex p = 0.980349
  # Antibiotics:Substrate p = 0.043134
  # Antibiotics:Sex p = 0.012671
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Antibiotics + Antibiotics*Substrate + Antibiotics*Sex, crds.p))
  # Antibiotics
    # Yes - No adj p = 0.000164, CI = -4.093812 - -1.535565
  # Substrate
    # Saline - Inulin adj p = 0.6338755, CI = -0.9818493 - 1.576397
  # Sex
    # Male - Female adj p = 0.9813636, CI = -1.315529 - 1.285958
  # Antibiotics:Substrate
    # Yes:Inulin - No:Inulin adj p = 0.0005620, CI = -6.4470696 - -1.68859627
    # No:Saline - No:Inulin adj p = 0.6740001, CI = -3.3461172 - 1.41235611
    # Yes:Saline - No:Inulin adj p = 0.0596263, CI = -4.8765289 - 0.07624711
    # No:Saline - Yes:Inulin adj p = 0.0078344, CI = 0.7217157 - 5.48018903
    # Yes:Saline- Yes:Inulin adj p = 0.2676078, CI = -0.8086960 - 4.14408002
    # Yes:Saline - No:Saline adj p = 0.3930039, CI = -3.9096484 - 1.04312764
  # Antibiotics:Sex
    # Yes:Female - No:Female adj p = 0.8653823, CI = -3.5643841 - 2.0154204
    # No:Male - No:Female adj p = 0.2537241, CI = -0.8279603 - 4.4387045 
    # Yes:Male - No:Female adj p = 0.1232221, CI = -5.2741028 - 0.4722996

    # Yes:Male - Yes:Female adj p = 0.2874963, CI = -4.1028078 - 0.8499682

### By Season + Antibiotics ###
crds.s.noabx <- crds.s[which(crds.s$Antibiotics == "No"),]
crds.s.abx <- crds.s[which(crds.s$Antibiotics == "Yes"),]
crds.w.noabx <- crds.w[which(crds.w$Antibiotics == "No"),]
crds.w.abx <- crds.w[which(crds.w$Antibiotics == "Yes"),]
crds.p.noabx <- crds.p[which(crds.p$Antibiotics == "No"),]
crds.p.abx <- crds.p[which(crds.p$Antibiotics == "Yes"),]

# Summer No ABX
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.s.noabx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex, crds.s.noabx))
  # Substrate p = 0.523
  # Sex p = 0.547

# Summer ABX
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.s.abx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex, crds.s.abx))
  # Substrate p = 0.0292
  # Sex = 0.2049
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex, crds.s.abx))
  # Saline - Inulin adj p = 0.0292041, CI = 0.1304445 - 1.873555
  # Male - Female adj p = 0.2095546, CI = -1.551012 - 0.3978453

# Winter No ABX
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.w.noabx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate*Sex, crds.w.noabx))
  # Substrate p = 0.1177
  # Sex = 0.1746
  # Substrate:Sex = 0.0307

# Winter ABX
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.w.abx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Not Normal
kruskal.test(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.w.abx)
  # p = 0.2232
kruskal.test(Baseline ~ Sex, crds.w.abx)
  # p = 0.2232


# Spring No ABX
  # Note: Not n = 3 for each group, so the stats don't really mean anything
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.p.noabx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex , crds.p.noabx))
  # Substrate p = 0.3273
  # Sex = 0.0746
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex , crds.p.noabx))
  # Saline - Inulin adj p = 0.3272579, CI = -3.047856 - 1.110713
  # Male - Female adj p = 0.0885661, CI = -0.3478459 - 4.254846 

# Spring No ABX
res <- resid(lm(Baseline ~ Substrate, crds.p.abx))
hist(res)
qqnorm(res)
qqline(res)
shapiro.test(res)
  # Normal
summary(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex , crds.p.abx))
  # Substrate p = 0.0555
  # Diet p = 0.0861
TukeyHSD(aov(Baseline ~ Substrate + Sex , crds.p.abx))
  # Saline - Inulin adj p = 0.0555378, CI = -0.04784369 - 3.386891
  # Male - Female adj p = 0.0868065, CI = -3.180826 - 0.2539094
```

### DNA Concentration
```{r}
dna <- read.csv("dna.csv", header=T)

# Pull out content samples
cc <- dna.con <- dna[which(substr(dna$Sample,1,2) == "CC"),]

# Separate
dna.inu <- dna.con[which(dna.con$Substrate == "Inulin"),]
dna.sal <- dna.con[which(dna.con$Substrate == "Saline"),]
dna.inu.s <- dna.inu[which(dna.inu$Season == "Summer"),]
dna.inu.w <- dna.inu[which(dna.inu$Season == "Winter"),]
dna.inu.p <- dna.inu[which(dna.inu$Season == "Spring"),]
dna.sal.s <- dna.sal[which(dna.sal$Season == "Summer"),]
dna.sal.w <- dna.sal[which(dna.sal$Season == "Winter"),]
dna.sal.p <- dna.sal[which(dna.sal$Season == "Spring"),]
```


### Find outliers
```{r}
### Boxplot - baseline
ggplot(base.inu.s, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
  # 1 ABX
ggplot(base.inu.w, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
  # 1 ABX
ggplot(base.inu.p, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
  # 1 ABX
ggplot(base.sal.s, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
  # 1 ABX
ggplot(base.sal.w, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
  # 2 ABX
ggplot(base.sal.p, aes(x = Antibiotics, y = Delta, fill = Antibiotics)) +
  geom_boxplot()
```
